website_summaries.verdict: An easy to use, lightweight wired scanner that can handle most scanning jobs well.
pros: Super-fast setup, interfacing instantly with Excel
Automatic scan feature is a nice plus
cons: Assembling the scanner stand is a little awkward
Parameter-setting barcodes have little explanation as to their purpose
Has trouble scanning barcodes on curved surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Very easy install
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this item and am very pleased with the ease of setup and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Keoke

customer_reviews.title: Liquor Lady
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a small business for the last 10 years and this bar code scan is by far the best I have ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: What a time  saver !
customer_reviews.text: I use this to scan upc barcodes to list and search items items on Amazon and Ebay. SOOOO much better than hand keying. What a time saver. Just plug it into your pc usb and go. No setup required.
customer_reviews.author: Two Mittens

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and use
customer_reviews.text: It only took me a couple of minutes to set this up on Windows 10, no driver disk needed. Scans fast and accurately.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Cavaretta

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: What a work saver. We had a project in the warehouse that required us to copy serial numbers from cell phones to an excel spreadsheet. I had no experience with bar code scanners but thought it was worth a try. I received this item, plugged it into a laptop, placed the curser in the right box in Excel and scanned it and it worked. No time to setup or CD's to load. Saved us so many hours and mistakes. Less than a minute to set up. Thank you, Thank you. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Merritt

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: It work fine different barcode code. Good presentation and secure box. I used in gas station work for long time and it work excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro A. Leon Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I work as an Instructional Material Technician for a school district. I scan all kinds of different barcodes in different formats, in varying lighting conditions, and this scanner works better than the $400 scanners my district used to buy from our textbook inventory control provider. I can scan at least 120 books per minute with this bad boy, with 100% accuracy (so far anyway). Plus this comes with a base? I am sold. We're buying a few dozen of these for our school sites based on my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and we are happy we bought this item! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hinzman

customer_reviews.title: Maybe just good for scanning books
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: They are emailing me offering $35 to delete this review. TOTAL SCUM. Because of the email, the rating has gone from 3 stars to1. Barcode has to be just right for it to scan. Seems very cheap and not worth the rice to me. Im sending it back and looking for a higher quality and higher functioning product. If you were just scanning books or very flat white barcodes, this is probably great for you.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Does not pick up all bar codes.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work on all the barcodes we scan. We have several different brands of scanners and this is the only one that does not scan barcodes we print on avery labels. We use it to scan bar codes on books, DVDs, etc. and it works fine for those, but on barcodes we print oursevles, we have to use one of our other scanners.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great reader for the money.
customer_reviews.text: While not as rugged as the big name industrial readers, this is going to give you the best bang for your buck. I have only seen one 1d bar code that I can't read and it isn't critical. I'm going to email the distributor a photo of that code to see if they can identify the unlock code for it. Otherwise, an A+ product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Good, simple, little scanner
customer_reviews.text: Nice scanner for simple barcodes. Seems not to respond to embedded control characters such as the <tab> and <return> functions. These functions can be added to the end of the scanned data by using their special setup scans included in the manual. When using these you will always get a <tab> tacked on to every scan. Never the less, it is indeed a good little scanner and seems to be quite reliable. I would also recomment that you go to their website and download a copy of the manual; easier to read than the somewhat small included manual. Novel idea: they could include a link to manual on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Frog

customer_reviews.title: Hard to scan glossy surfaces
customer_reviews.text: Nice scanner, but it doesn't like to scan barcodes printed on glossy services, takes many, many passes to get it to register if it does at all. I exchanged for a set of Vikeepro scanners and they seem to pick up glossy barcodes a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Bought 9 readers over the last 4 years and all have been great
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 9 of these barcode readers one by one starting in 2015 and over the last 4 years and all have been great. Every unit is still running so I keep buying more as our needs expand. These are used in an industrial environment and have been dropped on concrete floors and still work great. Even next to some spot welders. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great for my classroom library
customer_reviews.text: I use this scanner to help keep my inventory and classroom library up to date. No more buying duplicate books and the kids can help keep track of their own books, leaving extra time for me to have more one on one reading time! Love this scanner, I should have bought it much sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Plank

customer_reviews.title: The laser scanner runs perfectly with all popular software.
customer_reviews.text: Made of High quality ABS plastic. Equipped with hands-free and flexible Scanner stand for easy assembly without additional setup. Real auto-sensing function can release your hand, Wave barcodes under Scanner, scanning light turns on to scan automatically.
customer_reviews.author: Huy Le

customer_reviews.title: good item
customer_reviews.text: This Barcode Scanner is a good item I purchased. It is quite easy to use. What's more important is that the accuracy is high. I got positive experience every time. Also thanks to customer service give me lots of help. All in all, good item.
customer_reviews.author: myAmazon

customer_reviews.title: ... "TaoTronics" I got it in today and I really like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I saw a lot of cheaper scanners but chose to buy this one because it is a "TaoTronics" I got it in today and I really like it a lot. It is more solid than the one at work and the stand is strong durable. The scanning ability is amazing, you barely have to pass it over the barcode. You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: SMK

customer_reviews.title: Just plug it in and it works.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a one time project of cataloging about 600 videos and it worked very well. Just like checking out at the grocery store I just swiped the DVDs in front of it one after another. The ones still in cellophane sometimes needed to be angled to read, just like at the grocery store some things take a second swipe. The instructions aren't needed, just plug it in and it works. As for the pedestal, the assembly is intuitively obvious to the most casual observer and instructions aren't needed.
customer_reviews.author: Opus Frisbee

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad scanner - it has only a single thin line ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad scanner - it has only a single thin line which the barcode has to fit in to be read - so "aiming" is definitely part of the process. still it can be turned on and left active and you can slide something underneath, and at the price its a really decent device. I have another barcode gun which emits a rectangular beam which covers a huge area and is MUCH easier to get the barcode to read, but it cost 5x as much. I adjusted to 4 star since at the price it is still a good value.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Time-saver!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my purchase. It is a time-saver and possibly life-saver! Using this has helped me to reduce my time on receiving, processing, and posting inventories significantly. Although it cannot recognize a Mac laptop's keyboard, it works fine on other platforms--online, excel. Once and awhile it does not read barcodes and I needed to rescan it a few times. But to me, that is a minor issue.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Truong

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Product, would not recommend buying anything from this seller
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this scanner to be a back up scanner in case of an emergency, and guess what, when the real emergency came and I try to use it and test the product it only lasted for 3 days, with bare minimum use. Apparently the light is on bust nothing is scanning and seems like the motor inside is continuously running. Thanks for reading this anyways
customer_reviews.author: Puneet R.

customer_reviews.title: Please With My Scanner
customer_reviews.text: Product works pretty good. I'm using this scanner to track student attendance at my martial arts school. The scanner was super easy to set up. It can be a little difficult to scan at times & I find that it scans better if the barcodes are held at an angle. Overall, it's a great deal for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Lou

customer_reviews.title: Works with Booksource Classroom
customer_reviews.text: If you are a teacher with a lot of books in your library - this works with Booksource Classroom to scan the books in and out. Much faster than typing.
customer_reviews.author: fb

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner,  reads quick and accurate without a fuss
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup on my Mac. Reads barcodes on various surfaces much better than my old one. It’s very nice just to leave it on the stand and wave my package in front of it.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Hirschfelder

customer_reviews.title: Good scanner but won't scan smart phone screens.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of these scanners for our children's check-in system at our church. I agree with most of the reviews that it was a breeze to set up. Totally plug-n-play. The scanner itself was well-made. They used quality plastics and it definitely doesn't feel cheap. It scanned our keytags (think supermarket rewards card) perfectly. The one thing was that it wouldn't scan a barcode image from a smart phone. We tried with the iPhone 5, iPhone 4s, an Android phone, with and without screen protectors... didn't work. If you're looking for this functionality then you might want to look elsewhere. Otherwise this is a very nice scanner.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect device and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect scanner for many applications. It's easy to install (emulates a keyboard) and is really quick to scan. It has a great multi-scan mode that keeps it in a 'standby' state until you pass something underneath it. Then it quickly wakes up and scans the barcode. It's really quick to scan, faster than others I've worked with. There are a lot of configuration options, but for my use it was perfect right out of the box. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't scan bottles and cans
customer_reviews.text: I own a Liquor store business and pretty much 40% of my products doesn't scan at all unless the barcode is on the box or it's on a flat surface. Will not scan beer bottles and cans unless you fuss with it for 10 second or so which is way too long for the customers. For anyone that wants to use it for their Liquor store business, I do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mikie Yoo

customer_reviews.title: ... and this is the bar code scanner we always recommend. It is very reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: We set up Point of Sale systems for small business and this is the bar code scanner we always recommend. It is very reasonably priced, plug and play, and comes with a sturdy base. We have ordered 100's of barcode scanners from TaoTronics and never had a problem. I would highly recommend this barcode scanner to small businesses.
customer_reviews.author: betty

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this more expensive one because I guessed quality comes with a higher price. It doesn't. I suggest you buy a cheaper one and add on a 3 dollar insurance plan.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tallakson

customer_reviews.title: Came as discribed
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to install, but when help was needed, they were there
customer_reviews.author: Viola Soffe

customer_reviews.title: Great Barcode Scanner for the money. Nothing fancy but it does the job
customer_reviews.text: I use this for so many things it is crazy. I started to use it for the products I sell and now I use it for passwords and so much more. I have not had any problems with this and I use it on all sorts of program. This is a cost effective Barcode Scanner that works with Windows 10 and Linux.
customer_reviews.author: ThomB

customer_reviews.title: Booksellers Must-Have
customer_reviews.text: The Barcode Scanner is such a time saver even for the new seller just starting out on Amazon. If you save 10 minutes several times a day by not having to manually look up ISBN's and then type them in the search bar you will be paying yourself with the time saved. This product has unlimited possibilities. The instructions are vague, I suggest you just plug it in, click on the search bar, and scan a book. You will be able to easily figure it out. Good selling !!!!
customer_reviews.author: babs444

customer_reviews.title: Hands Free!
customer_reviews.text: A little sensitive, but I still love it. The item being scanned has to be in just the right place to get scanned. Sometimes it takes me awhile, especially with the tiny numbers and code that comes on various items.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lewis

customer_reviews.title: TaoTronics Barcode Scanner Handheld Wired Bar Code
customer_reviews.text: Love this !! It helps a lot and it is handy tool.
customer_reviews.author: babymagic1955

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly - replaced my old PS2 scanner
customer_reviews.text: When we got a new computer for our shipping station it no longer had a PS2 plug for the wedge scanner to plugged in. I paid about $150 for the old barcode scanner. This one was only $40 and worked like a champ as soon as we plugged it in. No programming, just plug in and start scanning. Nice mounting hardware included but we just have it sit on top of the shipping station beside the scale, sits there perfectly fine. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Best one around
customer_reviews.text: I got this scanner for my home based business and it worked well right out of the box. I had it for about 8 months and the scanner stand fell off of my desk. The neck broke and I was so bummed. Well I contacted and inquired about getting another one for my model with the intentions of paying since it was my fault. What do you know? They sent me another stand free of charge!! Who does that?!? Great customer service and great product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Grey's Matter

customer_reviews.title: Plug and Play for Interleaved 2 of 5
customer_reviews.text: Truly Plug and Play for my software that requires "interleaved 2 of 5." This works just as well as others that are way more expensive. I have recommended it to others in my association as a great buy, and compatible with our software. I didn't realize how slow my old dinosaurs were until I replaced one of them with this, then I had to order more and replace them all.
customer_reviews.author: Kidstuff

customer_reviews.title: Plugs in and just works - Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We use this in our office for shipping and receiving and we LOVE IT. On our Windows 7 workstations, no drivers were required. All we had to do was plug it into the USB slot. That being said, there is no software to program the scanner, which would have been a nice addition. Instead you have to scan bar codes on the manual that comes with it to change settings, such as whether to make the beep sound, duration of scan, etc. This is super convenient.....unless you lose that manual. I'm very happy as this reduces data entry mistakes and time dramatically.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Worked right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 of them and they both are doing their job. Use it for site access out in the open to scan badges and they work fine except when there is a lot of light. Sometimes has difficulty reading through plastic badge holders but I think it has more to do with the operator. It doesn't matter which computer you attach it to, it is inmediately recognized. They are sturdy and can take some abuse. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck in Tucson

customer_reviews.title: Basic barcode scanner for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased to allow for scanning of injectable drug bottles for tracking purposes and they work great. Haven't had a single issue with them, they don't get a lot of use but they also weren't hundreds of dollars. The manual is very sparse so if you want to do some sort of tricky stuff with them inserting numbers and changing scan types, good luck. It's a basic barcode scanner and that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: Terrillja

customer_reviews.title: Great Scanner! Purchased for use in school library.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this scanner to donate to my daughter's Charter School library as they were in need of more scanners. I was initially concerned about how much it would read and how it would interact with the library's catalog system. It works perfectly and the librarian is pleased! I would definitely recommend this scanner. Great price compared to the high-end ones that do almost the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: JF-Marietta, GA

customer_reviews.title: ... they helped me get my scanner scanning correctly so happy with the scanner the price is awesome for what ...
customer_reviews.text: Product was not working out at first but emailed there tech support and they helped me get my scanner scanning correctly so happy with the scanner the price is awesome for what I need it! I truly am happy with the product and I'm happy with the support I got from the company! Awesome product for what it's intention is since my last scanner was very expensive and does the exact thing this one does happy!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica G.

customer_reviews.title: One of my better purchases
customer_reviews.text: This scanner was purchased to log a 1000+ vinyl record collection. Regrettably, I didn't consider most of the albums were from the pre-barcode era. However, when I took on the task of cataloging my books and magazines, this scanner was exactly what I needed. Greatly shortened the time it took to finish the task. Plug into USB port and you're up and running, Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.author: not that tom

customer_reviews.title: Simply put : it just works.
customer_reviews.text: Simply put - I bought 4 of these to replace 4 shop scanners at an independent book store. The original items were $400 and that's what they'd been quoted to replace them. I replaced them with 4 of these priced at $40 (at time of writing) and they just worked - plugged in to the USB, beep, put in cradle, done. No fuss. Simple.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L

customer_reviews.title: It reads all kinds of barcodes well.
customer_reviews.text: It reads all kinds of barcodes well. It is easy to use due to its wide scanning range.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Works good. I had my doubts, especially since we have always used expensive Motorola and Symbol scanners mainly (same company now anyway). Be sure to scan the configuration codes in the included book before complaining. Know your symbology and limitations of this inexpensive scanner and you will be very happy.
customer_reviews.author: AllAboutThisProduct

customer_reviews.title: great scanner
customer_reviews.text: After reading bad reviews about scanners I decided to go for the bs003 what came with many good reviews and a nice price I use it in my deli to barcode the homemade stuff we make. It worked right out of the box in excel spreadsheet and in inventory programs I use. I have to figure out how upc works though and it could be nice to have a little section in the manual how to work with barcodes. YouTube did explained quiet a lot so I'm happy Leon
customer_reviews.author: landsheer

customer_reviews.title: This product worked great when we first bought it
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great when we first bought it. After about a month of using it, it just stopped scanning and will not do anything. The red scanner light comes on, but the scanner isn't communicating. I have had no changes with the PC I was using either. This happened about a week after we got it but, it eventually started working again. I have tried calibrating it with no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Zackery Fillers

customer_reviews.title: Great for gym that uses barcode keytags.
customer_reviews.text: Easy plug & play - reads our keytag codes without any problems. We do not take it off of the stand as our members swipe their cards as they enter the gym. Red line makes it easy for the members to see and the beep lets them know that their card has been read.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this scanner to use in an inventory management system I developed as part of my senior capstone. The system was written in VB.NET and this scanner was great because there was no messing with drivers. Windows recognized the scanner as a keyboard and I just added an event handler to the barcode field to handle the enter/return key press that the scanner sends after reading a barcode. I've since re-purposed the scanner for use in Delicious Library on my Macbook Pro. It has saved me quite a bit of time adding my DVD and CD collection. The scanner seems to be pretty solid and is worth the money if you're in the market for one.
customer_reviews.author: Shaggy

customer_reviews.title: Five stars for the product and TEN stars for their customer service!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the TaoTronics USB Barcode Scanner in 2013 to use in a children's library and LOVE it! When the stand broke from being knocked off the desk many times (happens with kids!) we contacted Tao for a replacement. They responded almost instantaneously and will be sending a new stand to us. We also own six of the scanners without stands and have nothing but positive experiences with those as well. If you need quality scanners, look no further!
customer_reviews.author: mamarox

customer_reviews.title: It works pretty well, though sometimes the combination of bright room ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this to aid in organizing and indexing my CD collection. It works pretty well, though sometimes the combination of bright room lighting and scratched or dirty cd cases slows it down.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce G. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: The instructions were great and allowed me to set the scanner to right ...
customer_reviews.text: Using this with QuickBooks POS, it was to replace a defective scanner that was an older serial interface. This was simple almost plug n play. The instructions were great and allowed me to set the scanner to right type in just a couple of minutes. Works well using for months now.
customer_reviews.author: darrell kueltzo

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive bar code scanners with stands.
customer_reviews.text: On one of the 5 I ordered we had to drill a hole in the metal weight for the stand. If the weight was pre-installed I would have liked it more. Improper assembly instructions explain the extra two screws and why it isn't pre-assembled. The extra two screws hold the arm which needs done before you install the weight. This could have been designed a bit different for easier assembly but I can't complain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Sadowski

customer_reviews.title: It works right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: It took a screw driver and 5 minutes to assemble the stand, plug in the USB cord and it worked. The manual has instruction for programing but the standard out of the box program scans and sends a return code which is what I needed to scan DVDs and Blue-Rays into my inventory system. I leave the wand on the stand and pass the DVD under the wand, one beep and it's done.
customer_reviews.author: brez

customer_reviews.title: Overall this is a good quality scanner at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a good quality scanner at an affordable price. When buying software for our small library we were told to buy a scanner that cost hundreds of dollars; we've found that this scanner does the job just fine. The only drawback is that the scanner tends to stick in its holder and sometimes pulling it out is a two-handed job - this may be a deal breaker for some, but we'll just leave the scanner face down on the table when it's being frequently used.
customer_reviews.author: craptasticluke

customer_reviews.title: Plug n Play
customer_reviews.text: We put it together, plugged it in and it worked. Literally plug and play for UPC scanning. If you have special needs there is a small instruction manual that allows you to scan in other scanning options, but the loaded options worked for us right out of the box. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Consultx

customer_reviews.title: Had operator issues
customer_reviews.text: If you have problems getting it to scan unplug it and plug directly into the computers USB outlet I had it on a splitter and it didn't work. Tech support was great using the amazon chat. Gotta go scan....
customer_reviews.author: Extreme Brands

customer_reviews.title: This is so easy. Just plug and use
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy. Just plug and use. I use it all the time since I got it for my own inventory and for searching online products. Great little scanner for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Case

customer_reviews.title: READ THE DIRECTIONS
customer_reviews.text: We use this for taking school pics. (Hint: READ THE DIRECTIONS)... You have to program the scanner by scanning the ON barcode that you plan to use. We use 39. About drove us nuts. Figured it out and now it's a breeze. It even senses that there's something to be scanned. Great device!!!
customer_reviews.author: J SCOTT BUMGARDNER

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one. Don't hassle with others!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product and we'll worth the $5 extra bucks compared to those cheaper ones. It comes with a full manual to customize settings. Also, it's well manufacturered with nice feeling materials. To my surprise, automatic scanning with a motion sensor is standard.
customer_reviews.author: MIchael Hillman

customer_reviews.title: Tao Tronics TT-BS003 Scanner very good product.
customer_reviews.text: The Tao Tronics TT-BS-BS003 scanner gets 5 stars for three reasons. First, very good price for the whole package which includes a weighted stand (good design feature). Second, very simple design and function. Third, works very good. Once I read the manual 2 pages and discovered I needed a USB splitter for proper functioning. Amazon had the perfect product in stock, a pluggable USB 2.0 2 port hub from Plugable Technologies. I ordered it and the set up took 15 minutes mostly finding the right combination of codes from the manual. Then bingo, I was scanning my CD collection. Fabulous time saver and kind of fun. Great job!
customer_reviews.author: Tom S. Gottshalk

customer_reviews.title: Based on the reviews it was better quality than I expected and requires no drivers
customer_reviews.text: Based on the reviews it was better quality than I expected and requires no drivers. If it's in the stand it will last a very long time, if you're using it as a hand scanner it's not built for the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Glaves

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my business to scan job codes for accurate project billing. It was super easy to install and works great. The staff just loves it and everyone can use it without issue. I would definitely recommend this to anyone with scanning needs. The vendor shipped this very quickly. It arrived in perfect shape and was packaged safely.
customer_reviews.author: LeozprideTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product works good. Returned because my custom barcodes are too long ended up getting a qr scanner. But product worked great. I should of did more research on scanners
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great Scanner for Price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this scanner to use at my retail store in conjunction with my POS sytem. When this scanner arrived it was as easy as plug and play! Once configured via POS sytem I was away scanning products. The handheld is comfortable and accurate. The stand is a huge plus for me!
customer_reviews.author: Chips

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scanner for the price
customer_reviews.text: Scanner works really well. It's easy to configure different settings (using barcodes) and it's withstood the test of time in our cafeterias. We purchase these exclusively.
customer_reviews.author: John Dombrowski

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This product does the job for not much money. I appreciate the stand that allows me to wave products under it instead of having to hold both the product and the scanner. It was easy to install, especially because I wasn't interested in the extra features. I just use it to type in the numbers and hit the enter key for me. It suits me well.
customer_reviews.author: CritiCal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Plug and Play. Works well, and is so much cheaper than the alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Derek J. Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Work perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Pluged in and work instantly but do not like the style very much.
customer_reviews.author: Zeng

customer_reviews.title: Great barcode scanner!
customer_reviews.text: Product delivered quickly, was easy to assemble, and is easy to use. Box packaging has photos of product on outside; request Amazon packaging to alleviate porch pirate thievery.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I sell on Ebay and I love this, it saves time.
customer_reviews.author: Cori Hingst

customer_reviews.title: Good Lightweight machine, lacks clear instructions
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to work with some tracking software related to our industry (print/design). Its for light office use, and I feel that is what this machine is geared for. Its solid in that regard, and easy to get started. However, the instructions are rather poor. Unless you have a decent idea of how you need the scanner to be set up, and how to input those settings to the machine - then you will spend time Googling for answers with this machine. We have had it in place for 2 weeks, it works well for us so far.
customer_reviews.author: cutpasteandprint

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to use, I have had no problems with this scanner. I use it to catalog my book collection, it's so much easier than inputting my books manually! I love the stand for hands-free scanning. Overall I am very satisfied with this scanner and would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Cassy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for quickly getting our inventory into a spreadsheet
customer_reviews.text: Simple. Plug and play. Perfect for quickly getting our inventory into a spreadsheet.
customer_reviews.author: Izabela

customer_reviews.title: Good Unit at Good Price
customer_reviews.text: We used this unit for a checkin station at our local Rotary. We used micro qr codes and it would scan in 1 to 2 seconds per label. The only negative is that the width of the laser is a bit thin and can be a bit frustrating to line up. No software is required with Windows XP or above to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: mcgman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product but material of stand is kind of cheap plastic. It was broken with mild push.
customer_reviews.author: Adem Hadzialic

customer_reviews.title: Great barcode scanner
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and quick for windows machine to recognize and use right away. The base of the stand comes off pretty easily but that shouldn't be too much of a problem because in most cases the stand wouldn't be moved around. Reads lots of different barcodes instantly. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Buchholz

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on faded barcodes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an old Motorola scanner that got dropped. This one is a good scanner as long as the barcode is perfect. I use it to take attendance at our local Rotary Club, and the barcodes are on the back of member badges. Over time, the barcodes fade just a bit, and this scanner is only able to read the barcode 50% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Urschel

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This little unit was ready to start scanning right out of the box. It works very well and is a timesaver. No need for manuel entry any longer. One tip: when assembling the stand make sure that holder is facing in proper direction from base plate before setting weight plate.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Scanner!
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased with this scanner. A friend recommended it and when I started using it I found that it was very sensitive and very fast. Plug and play, very easy. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Mesa

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a scanner to log customers in to a service center. We were given a bid of $100+ per scanner from our purchasing department and told to be sure to contact them to have the scanners programmed when they arrived. Deciding to check out Amazon, I found this item and ordered it figuring I would just return it if it didn't fit the bill. This scanner worked right out of the box! Just plugged it in and we were off to the races. The stand is stable and easy to assemble. I'm sure we'll be ordering more for our other locations. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: bj

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, works great with Quickbooks Point of Sale 2013 and Windows 8.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why we waited so long to get a barcode scanner for our Point of Sale system. This scanner works great for us. Setup was a breeze and it has worked flawlessly since being setup. We have Quickbooks Point of Sale 2013 running on Windows 8.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work with mac, poor product support.
customer_reviews.text: Scans and beeps but won't import into my mac. User guide is not helpful, support from website is just a pdf version of the poorly translated user guide. For set up, the guide says "requires a knowledgeable person on this mode and must be very familiar with scanners." Defeats the purpose of simple to use. This is being returned.
customer_reviews.author: small business owner

customer_reviews.title: The barcode scanner is working just fine in our business
customer_reviews.text: The barcode scanner is working just fine in our business, we are actually purchasing more of these, I love the fact it will auto scan for hands free operation.
customer_reviews.author: From33043

customer_reviews.title: I already have bought 3.  It is perfect for its cheap price.
customer_reviews.text: It's in a bunch of retail places. It is cheap, lasts forever, and works. Reads all beverage barcodes with ease. True plug and play
customer_reviews.author: Jason Kim

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed when I started my Amazon business
customer_reviews.author: momentumrider

customer_reviews.title: Great, versatile scanner
customer_reviews.text: The scanner itself is great. We use it on our Lube Centers for inspections - we scan the VIN on most vehicles to save time and be more efficient. However, after a week of using it, the scanner cable on the USB plug end came apart from the housing and eventually stopped working properly. I assume it was just a defective cord. I ordered a replacement cord and we're good to go again. It would have been nice to not have to order a new one so soon after purchase, though.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Star

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product was very easy to set up. It worked properly right away. Fast shipping! So far no complaints will probably order another if it continues to work this nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Tanlee Noomen

customer_reviews.title: Easy..
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the same bar code scanners for a about 10 years. It recently went dead, so of course, first place to look and buy is Amazon. I found this scanner which was cheap and had good reviews(reviews are my huge buying point). When I got it I literally plugged it in and was back to work, didn't need to install any drivers or firmware or software. The product looks nice as well. its easy to plug and play or unplug and put away. I would recommend this product and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Aash

customer_reviews.title: Business Sanity ... Incredible  Time Saver! Thank You!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has made my book listing 1000 times easier. Easy install, up and going full steam in minutes. Thank you for helping make my 'doing business time' so much more efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Poincianablaze

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but beware of the hardware components of the scanner
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Pretty easy to use; almost like a plug-and-play Cons: The manual is difficult to understand. The stand comes with metal plates to be fastened with screws to the bottom of the stand so that it can stand upright at a steady position; however, the size of the screws is completely difficult from the size of the hole they are supposed to put in and as a result, the metal plate cannot be fastened to the bottom of the stand.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: A bit less forgiving than a symbol scanner. Especially ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit less forgiving than a symbol scanner. Especially on the very small barcodes. If you need to do a ton of the small Cisco barcodes on APs and/or phones get one of the symbol 2d scanners. Wayyyy less frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth V. Mattson III

customer_reviews.title: Codabar Enabled By Default
customer_reviews.text: I work in a Library and have had a terrible time finding a bar code scanner that had codabar enabled by default. The Taotronics scanner is inexpensive and works right out of the box, which saves us the time of setting them up when they arrive. Overall, it does exactly what we want for 1/3 the price. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a barcode scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Amy

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little tool for our business. Plug and play via USB port and can automatically scan via motion sensor or you can trigger it to read on demand. Has been working perfectly since I purchased it and 4 others.
customer_reviews.author: Helping out

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected and it works well
customer_reviews.text: I plugged it in, when to a Google, scanned an item and the search results appeared. I planned to write additional software to support this scanner anyway, but this will make my life so much easier when it comes to inventorying my embedded systems components.
customer_reviews.author: HopWorks

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. I bought it to help catalog an extensive CD and DVD collection and it worked great. It was truly plug and play with no problems whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this scanner to use in our school library to assist with our circulation system when we have multiple classes. I needed a USB scanner that I could use with a laptop. The scanner is glitchy for me. Sometimes it works well and then it freezes up and won't scan until I've made multiple attempts. Frustrating. I purchased it to save time and so far, it has not helped in that area. I found the directions less than helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: The Taotronics scanner arrived quickly and performed like a champ as soon as I plugged it in to my laptop. I have it set to automatic, and whenever I need to scan, it fires right up and gives me that comforting "beep" that my barcodes have scanned successfully. Highly recommend. Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Ginia

product_meta.title: TaoTronics Barcode Scanner Handheld Wired Bar Code 1D USB Laser Scanner with Adjustable Stand for Computer, Extremely Fast and Precise Auto Scan Support Windows/Mac/iOS/Android System
product_meta.description: Adesso Taotronics Usb Barcode Scanner Wired Handheld Laser Bar Code Scanner Automatic Sensing And Scan Black.
feature_bullets: Auto Sensing Technology: Real Auto-Sening function can release your hand, scanning light turns on and scan automatically when a barcode presented in front of the scanner
Ergonomic Design: Built with high quality ABS plastic passed 1.5M drop test and package with hands-free flex barcode Stand

Widely Decode Ability: UPC/UCC/EAN 128/Code 39/Code 39 Full ASCII/Trioptic Code 39/Code 128/Code 128 Full ASCII/Codabar/Interleaved 2 of 5/Discrete 2 of 5/Code 93/MSI/Code 11/RSS variants/Chinese 2 of 5/180 configurable options for prefix, suffix and termination strings
Plug and Play: No need software, Easy to plug Your Laser Scanner in USB port of yor device and begin scan.
Widely Compatible Ability: Works With Windows, Mac OS, and Linux. And perfectly running with Quickbook, Word, Excel, Novell, and all common software

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars815 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
